mapper.delete: UPDATE tty_po_anno t set t.delete_flag = 1,t.modify_user = #{modifyUser},t.modify_date = #{modifyDate} where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId} and ANNO_TYPE = #{annoType}
mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_po_anno set
BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId},
ANNO_PARENT_ID = #{annoParentId},
ANNO_TYPE = #{annoType},
ANNO_NAME = #{annoName},
ANNO_USER_ID = #{annoUserId},
ANNO_USER_DEPID = #{annoUserDepid},
BY_ANNO_USER_ID = #{byAnnoUserId},
BY_ANNO_USER_DEPID = #{byAnnoUserDepid},
ANNO_DATE = #{annoDate},
CONTENT = #{content},
ROOT_PARENT_ID = #{rootParentId},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where ID = #{id}
